tool_description: The Current Affairs API provides up-to-date news headlines based on user-specified criteria, allowing users to stay informed about the latest developments around the world.
name: Current Affairs API
title: Current Affairs API

api_list.name: World Affairs API
api_list.description:
(PRESS THE KEY TO RETRIEVE DATA)
retrieve current affairs news from around the world.
Specify the target country using query parameters.
Powered by the reliable News API for accurate and timely information
